intro.title: Why is a webshop crucial for your success?
intro.p1: In the digital age, an online store is not a luxury but a necessity. Your competitors are already selling online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. A webshop allows you to reach customers worldwide, increase revenue and automate the sales process.
intro.p2: Our webshops are not just digital stores - they are powerful business tools that transform the way you run your business. With advanced inventory management features, automated order processing and detailed analytics, your webshop becomes the heart of your digital business.
intro.p3: We use the latest technologies like React.js and Next.js that guarantee speed, security and excellent positioning on Google search engines. Unlike WordPress or other template solutions, our custom webshops are optimized for performance and SEO from day one.

process.title: What does the webshop development process look like?

step1.title: Analysis and Planning
step1.description: We thoroughly analyze your needs, target audience, competition and business goals. We create a strategy for your webshop that includes product selection, pricing policy, marketing strategy and an implementation plan for all required features.

step2.title: Design and UX/UI
step2.description: We create a modern, functional and conversion-oriented design. The webshop design must be intuitive, easy to navigate and optimized to convert visitors into customers. We focus on the user experience that leads to purchase.

step3.title: Development and Integrations
step3.description: We use the latest e-commerce technologies to develop your webshop. We integrate all necessary systems: payment gateways, courier services, CRM, email marketing, analytics and other third-party services. We implement all agreed functionalities.

step4.title: Product and Content Entry
step4.description: We help you enter products, categories, descriptions, images and all necessary information. We optimize content for SEO and conversions. You can add products yourself through an intuitive admin panel or we can do it for you.

step5.title: Testing and Optimization
step5.description: We thoroughly test all functionalities: purchase process, payment, delivery, email notifications, mobile version. We optimize loading speed, check security and test on different devices and browsers.

step6.title: Launch and Training
step6.description: We launch your webshop, set up Google Analytics, Search Console and other tracking tools. We train you to work with the admin panel, manage orders, products and all other functions. We provide post-launch support.

q1.question: How much does webshop development cost?
q1.answer: The price depends on numerous factors: number of products, functionality complexity, required integrations, design and specific requirements. Our basic package starts from affordable prices for small businesses, while premium solutions with advanced features can be more expensive but bring significant ROI. Contact us for a personalized quote.

q2.question: How long does webshop development take?
q2.answer: A basic webshop can be completed in 10-14 days. Professional webshops with more features usually take 14-21 days, while complex enterprise solutions can take 21-30 days or more. Time depends on the number of products, integrations and specific requirements. We regularly update you on progress during development.

q3.question: Can I add and change products myself?
q3.answer: Absolutely! All our webshops come with an intuitive admin panel where you can easily add new products, change prices, manage inventory, track orders and all other functions. We provide detailed training and documentation. The admin panel is designed to be simple to use without technical knowledge.

q4.question: Which payment gateways do you support?
q4.answer: We integrate all popular payment gateways: bank cards (Visa, MasterCard, Maestro), PayPal, Stripe, local banks, cash on delivery. All payment processes are completely secure and compliant with PCI DSS standards.

q5.question: Is the webshop SEO optimized?
q5.answer: Yes, SEO optimization is built into all our webshops. We implement best SEO practices: optimized URL structures, meta tags for each product, rich snippets, schema markup for products, speed optimization, mobile responsiveness and everything else that Google ranks. The result is better visibility and more organic traffic.

q6.question: What happens after launch? Do you provide support?
q6.answer: After launch we provide technical support that is included in the package (3-6 months depending on the package). We help you with all questions, solve any problems and work on optimizations. After the initial period, you can continue with our maintenance service or manage the webshop independently.

q7.question: Can I migrate my existing webshop?
q7.answer: Yes, we can migrate your existing webshop from any platform (WooCommerce, Shopify, Magento, PrestaShop) to our optimized custom platform. Migration includes all products, customers, orders, categories and other data. Your webshop will be faster, more secure and better optimized after migration.
